title: Kcet
content: Can anyone pls ask in the department will the r2 and r3 students start together or the r3 students will be put in between with  the ongoing r2 classes laterðŸ˜¥

comments.body: I had the same question and even sent email to PES and called them but they did not respond. I guess they will start R2 and R3 together since KEA will complete R3 immediately after R2 with maybe a week gap between the 2 rounds
i got aiml in 2nd round, should i wait till 2nd extended round to get cse..... pls help urgent!
confused now whether to wait for R3 and try  RVCE upgradation
What did u get in R2?
Anyway we have missed the bootstrap induction program, shld we wait for R3 ?
PES CS in R1 and R2

my guess is they will start classes together for R2 and R3 so if you feel that your rank has a chance of getting an upgraded college or course, makes sense to wait for R3

check the cutoffs when KEA releases it today
Either way ur going to join late might as well take risk for cse
I am going to extended round
Would u mind sharing ur rank ?
